page.description: Specify the Id of the button in the Panel Navigator Header or Footer that should be used for the 'Next' button.

section.description: For a guide on how to add a 'Next' button to a component see the guide on the ['Previous card' button Id] page. Adding a 'Next' button to a component footer might look something like this:

You can define Panel Headers and Panel Footers by clicking the [Container] option in the Containers menu on the UX Controls page. Panel Header and Panel Footer should be one of the options in the Container Type list. The buttons are added from the Other controls menu. After defining a button in a Panel Navigation header or footer you can use the 'Next button Id' property to assign that button as the 'Next' button. Any time the button is clicked, the next panel in the Panel Navigator will be displayed; this according to the order of the panels and the flow direction.
